meanings.definition: A portmanteau of Emily and Alison, used to refer to the romantic pairing of the characters Emily Fields and Alison DiLaurentis from the television series Pretty Little Liars.
meanings.english_definition: A portmanteau of Emily and Alison, used to refer to the romantic pairing of the characters Emily Fields and Alison DiLaurentis from the television series Pretty Little Liars.

examples.sentence: Many fans of Pretty Little Liars were excited when Emison became canon.
examples.translation: プリティ・リトル・ライアーズの多くのファンは、エミソンが公式になったとき興奮しました。

etymology.value: Combination of the names Emily and Alison.

usage_notes.explanation: Used primarily within the Pretty Little Liars fandom.
